title: Save Mayrina
content:
and the two men will start the Save Mayrina Quest.

Head west to reach the Riverside Teahouse Waypoint, then continue west from the waypoint to reach the Gnarled Teahouse. As soon as you enter, you'll trigger a cutscene with Auntie Ethel and Mayrina. If you sold Auntie Ethel out during your conversation with Johl and Demir earlier in the Sunlit Wetlands, she will acknowledge it and demand that you apologize.
